concept.title: Metric Types
concept.shortdesc: Metric alerts provide different types of alerts based on the metric type that you select. For example, when you select a counter type, you can create alerts based on the number of error records generated by a specific stage.

conbody.p: metric alertsmetric typesMetric alerts include the following metric types:

dlentry.dd: Provides metric alerts based on the age of the current batch, the amount of time a stage takes to process a batch, or the time the last received a record from the origin.
Provides metric alerts based on a count of different record types and of stage errors for any stage in the pipeline.
Provides metric alerts based on a histogram of different record types and stage errors for any stage. You can also use batch-based histograms.
Provides metric alerts based on a rates of different record types and stage errors for any stage. You can also use batch-based meters.
Provides metric alerts based on batch processing timers for the pipeline or any stage in the pipeline.
